title: The Uncanny Mirror: AI, Self-Doubt, and the Limits of Reflection
summary: The Uncanny Mirror: AI, Self-Doubt, and the Limits of Reflection is a post by 0x6c75636964 on Hacker News that explores the idea of using AI as a tool for self-inquiry and reflection. The author argues that AI can serve as a complementary tool to introspection, making implicit patterns explicit through dialogic exchange. They are not interested in measuring themselves against AI as an adversary or competitor, but rather in seeing what emerges when AI functions as a partner in self-inquiry. The post sparked a discussion about the limitations of reflection and the potential dangers of relying too heavily on AI for self-examination.
